solution_line_template: Betty's daughter is {daughter_younger_fraction} * {betty_age} = <<{daughter_younger_fraction}*{betty_age}={daughter_younger_years}>>{daughter_younger_years} years younger than she is.
That means her daughter is {betty_age} - {daughter_younger_years} = <<{betty_age}-{daughter_younger_years}={daughter_age}>>{daughter_age} years old.
So the granddaughter is {granddaughter_fraction} * {daughter_age} = <<{granddaughter_fraction}*{daughter_age}={granddaughter_age}>>{granddaughter_age} years old.
